id: Shiitake Soup with Parsley and Mixed Herbs

ins.1: Clean shiitake mushrooms and cut into strips, peel and chop garlic, chop parsley coarsely
ins.2: Heat a pot and melt the coconut oil. Sauté shiitake mushrooms and garlic briefly
ins.3: Vegetable broth, parsley, peppercorns and salad herbs add. Simmer for ~10 minutes

ins.1: Peel onion and garlic, chop both and sauté in a pan with coconut oil
ins.2: Cut tofu into stripes, remove the stalk of the canned tomatoes and cut into small pieces
ins.3: Put tomatoes together with the peppercorns, oregano and salt in the pan, simmer for 5 minutes, stir occasionally
ins.4: Coarsely chop coriander and add together with the tofu in the sauce, simmer for a further ~ 7 minutes, stir occasionally

id: Grated Kohlrabi Salad with Beetroot, Carrot, Cucumber and Sprouts

ins.1: Mix well soy yogurt together with all the herbs, salt, rapeseed oil and agave syrup
ins.3: Peel kohlrabi, carrots and beetroot and grater coarsely all together with the cucumber (alternatively: chop coarsely and blend briefly)
ins.4: Mix everything well and serve with the sprouts

ins.1: Peel and finely grate the ginger. Wash the lemon well and rub the peel
ins.2: Mix the soft margarine with the sugar. Put in the flour, baking powder, ginger and lemon peel and process it into a paste
ins.3: Form balls with your hands (about 2.5 cm ∅) and put on a baking sheet with parchment paper, leaving a little distance. Press the balls flat with a fork
ins.4: Set the oven to 170 °C and place them in the middle for 13 minutes, then take the ginger biscuits from the baking tray and leave them to cool
